name: fabex
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: -| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c1, c2), w0)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c0, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c0, universe))

stmt.origin: fabexg(s0, c1, universe, c2, universe, c0, w0)
stmt.pretty: fabexg(s0, c1, universe, c2, universe, c0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c1, c2), w0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c1, c2), w0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Existence of a set of functions. (Contributed by NM, 3-Dec-2007.)
